mapper.insert: insert into tbl_restaurant_review (Restaurant_ID, Member_ID, Restaurant_Review) values (#{restaurantID}, #{memberID}, #{restaurantReview})
mapper.update: update tbl_restaurant_review set Restaurant_Review = #{restaurantReview}, Restaurant_Review_Time = now() where Restaurant_Review_ID = #{restaurantReviewID}
mapper.select: select count(Restaurant_Review_ID) from tbl_restaurant_review where Restaurant_ID = #{restaurantID}
